message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to start with an offer of $12000 for the product. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you think $9000 is a fair price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer you a price of $11500.
